summary: Verified backend refactoring from monolithic server.py to modular structure. Backend: 42/42 tests passed (100%). Frontend: All 15 dashboard pages load correctly. The refactoring maintains full API compatibility - no breaking changes detected.

issues: Console warnings about chart dimensions (-1 width/height) - cosmetic issue, charts still render

passed_tests: Backend: POST /api/auth/login (client) returns token and user
Backend: POST /api/auth/login (admin) returns token and user
Backend: POST /api/auth/login with invalid credentials returns 401
Backend: GET /api/auth/me returns user info with valid token
Backend: GET /api/dashboard/overview returns KPIs, pipeline, schedule
Backend: GET /api/calendar returns year, month, submissions
Backend: GET /api/analytics/dashboard returns snapshots and summary
Frontend: Login as client (alex@company.com / client123) works
Frontend: /dashboard/overview loads with KPIs, pipeline, schedule
Frontend: /dashboard/strategy (AI Lab) loads with LLM options
critical_code_review_comments: Refactoring is well-structured with clear separation: /routers (14 files), /models (7 files), /services (5 files), /db (mongo.py)
All API paths, methods, and field names remain identical - no breaking changes
server.py is now a thin wrapper that imports from main.py for backwards compatibility
context_for_next_testing_agent: Backend has been refactored from monolithic server.py (~2000 lines) to modular structure. New structure: /routers (auth, dashboard, submissions, assets, calendar, deliverables, analytics, roi, billing, settings, help, blog, ai, video_tasks, fvs), /models (auth, content, settings, help, ai, fvs), /services (auth_service, ai_service, video_task_service, fvs_service), /db (mongo.py). All 42 API tests pass. All 15 frontend pages load correctly.

mocked_integrations.video_generation: MOCKED - Kling, Runway, Veo providers return sample video URLs
mocked_integrations.audio_generation: MOCKED - ElevenLabs returns placeholder audio URL
mocked_integrations.thumbnail_generation: MOCKED - DALL-E returns placeholder image URL
mocked_integrations.llm_providers: NOT MOCKED - Real LLM calls via emergentintegrations (Gemini, Anthropic)
